events.message: I would like to request a refund for the headphones I purchased last week because they stopped working after just two days.
The case is categorized under Refund due to the customer requesting their money back for a faulty product.
The refund request case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for further handling and resolution.
Hello! Thank you for contacting customer support. I'm here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and details about the issue with the headphones to proceed with your refund?
The order number is 987654321. The headphones began producing static noise and then stopped working altogether within two days.
We can process a full refund for your purchase. Please confirm if you want us to initiate the refund to your original payment method.
Yes, I would like the refund to be issued as soon as possible. Thank you for handling this quickly.
Your refund has been processed successfully and the amount should appear in your bank within 5-7 business days.
We are following up to ensure that you have received your refund and to check if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund has been confirmed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
